articles.title: Resident confirmed with measles case after traveling - KHON2
articles.description: HONOLULU (KHON2) — The Hawaii State Department of Health is working to prevent the spread of measles, after a confirmed case of an unvaccinated Oahu resident who recently returned from international travel. Health officials have not released the age of the re…
